source: TEXT_HEAVNZ634_01902_SEQ_00<tab>Caribault seeks an adventurer who is not afraid to get dirty.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ634_01902_SEQ_00<tab>Caribault cherche un aventurier qui n'a pas peur de se salir les mains.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ634_01902_SEQ_01<tab>Crops are only as fine as the soil from which they are grown, and Caribault is in need of blackloam to ensure a bountiful harvest. He asks that you bring him five bushels of the rich soil from wisent grazing grounds east of Camp Cloudtop.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ634_01902_SEQ_01<tab>Caribault a besoin de fumier pour ses plantations. Mêlez-vous à la harde de wisents pour en obtenir cinq sacs.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ634_01902_SEQ_02<tab>You collect five bushels of blackloam. Take them to Caribault so he can prepare the soil for a rich harvest.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ634_01902_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez obtenu cinq sacs de fumier. Retournez au camp de Cime-des-nuages pour les apporter à Caribault.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ634_01902_SEQ_03<tab>Caribault is thrilled to see your bag filled to the brim with rich blackloam. He notes that it is particularly rich, perhaps because it is so fresh. As you leave, he suggests you clean yourself up. You cannot help but wonder if the job was dirtier than he would have you believe.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ634_01902_SEQ_03<tab>Caribault était ravi que vous lui ayez procuré du fumier par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>rement riche. Il vous a aussi recommandé de vous laver les mains... Décidément, c'est toujours vous qui vous tapez le sale boulot<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ634_01902_CARIBAULT_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Your timing is impeccable! I need you to retrieve five bushels of blackloam for the crops. You can find it in the fields east of here where the wisents graze. I would go myself but I haven't the stomach for it. Going near those gargantuan beasts, that is.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ634_01902_CARIBAULT_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Vous ne pouviez pas mieux tomber<var 1D /var>! J'aimerais que vous m'apportiez cinq sacs de fumier frais pour mes cultures. Vous pourrez les trouver dans les champs peuplés de wisents, à l'est d'ici. J'irais bien moi-même, mais ces bestioles sont tellement grosses...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ634_01902_CARIBAULT_000_010<tab>Five bushels of blackloam should do the trick. Be careful not to get trampled by the wisents, though.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ634_01902_CARIBAULT_000_010<tab>Cinq sacs de fumier frais devraient suffire pour cette fois-ci. Faites attention à ne pas vous laisser piétiner par les wisents<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ634_01902_CARIBAULT_000_020<tab><sniff> Ah, say no more─you've collected the blackloam, yes? I fear we can't expect a good harvest without it.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ634_01902_CARIBAULT_000_020<tab>Avez-vous récupéré le fumier<var 1D /var>? Je crains que ce soit un élément in<var 16 /var>dis<var 16 /var>pen<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>ble pour avoir une bonne récolte...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ634_01902_CARIBAULT_000_021<tab>Oh my! It's been a while since we've had such rich loam. Splendid work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I knew I could count on you.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ634_01902_CARIBAULT_000_021<tab>Ça alors, il y a longtemps que je n'ai pas vu de fumier aussi riche<var 1D /var>! Bon travail, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Je savais que je pouvais compter sur vous.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ634_01902_CARIBAULT_000_022<tab>The wisents are quite dangerous, to be sure, but I cannot deny the benefits of their, erm...<var 1A 02 /var>contributions<var 1A 01 /var> to nature. Which reminds me, you may want to wash up before you do any more adventuring.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ634_01902_CARIBAULT_000_022<tab>Les wisents re<var 16 /var>pré<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>tent une menace, certes, mais on ne peut pas ignorer les bénéfices de leurs, euh... <var 1A 02 /var>con<var 16 /var>tri<var 16 /var>bu<var 16 /var>tions<var 1A 01 /var> à la nature. D'ailleurs, je vous conseille de vous laver les mains avant de toucher à quoi que ce soit.
